QuestData.Title: The Traitor Unmasked
QuestData.Description:
We must waste no time in warning the margrave of Kel'Thuzad's treachery. His reckless toying with forbidden powers could bring ruin to the house and beyond!
Let us put an end to this!
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Mastermind behind the chaos in the House of Rituals and Maldraxxus.
QuestData.LogDescription: Confront Kel'Thuzad in the Hall of Sorcery.
QuestData.RewardText:
I didn't think we would make it out of that encounter intact.
You are truly a skilled $c, $n.
